subject: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Beneficiary
It might Interest you to know that the sum of $8.8M had been set aside
for compensation which will be paid to you via Online Banking by the
BANK CENTRAL ASIA, Indonesia,  It was Endorsed by the American
Government and In Conjunction with the Homeland Security Service
during a meeting today 20=01=2023.
Meanwhile you are to contact the Director in charge in respect of Dr.
David Benson with the details below
  Name: Dr. David Benson
  Bank Email: 
davidbenson@accountant.com
  Private email : 
dbenbb19@gmail.com
Meanwhile this Compensation department has been mandated by the IMF
and the United Nations to transfer your compensation funds to you
through Online Transfer Payment which is 100 % Guarantee for payment
to you.
Regards
Barrister George  Melvin

subject: Re:   Dear Beneficiary
body:
Hello Barrister George Melvin,

Thank you for your message. It's quite intriguing to hear about this sum of money that has been set aside. I must admit, I'm not entirely sure how this came about. Could you perhaps provide a bit more context or explanation?

You mentioned the involvement of BANK CENTRAL ASIA, Indonesia, the American Government and Homeland Security Service. That sounds very official! How did they all come to be involved in this matter?

Also, you've asked me to contact Dr. David Benson. May I ask what his role is in all of this? And could you please provide his contact details?

I appreciate your assistance with these questions.

Best wishes,
Teresa

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Mrs. Teresa 
This is to acknowledge receipt of your email and its content well noted and Understood, be informed that your approved Inheritance fund is with our Bank the Bank Central Asia, Jakarta Indonesia and we shall transfer the fund to your destination as soon as you furnish us with your fund details. 
However, before we can proceed further, You are advised to fill and return to us the attached official bank form with your receiving account details and also your direct mobile number, Upon receipt of the information we shall proceed immediately with the transfer procedures in making sure the transfer is made directly to your account in your country. 
Thanks for Banking with us and congratulations in Advance.
Regards 
David Benson 
International Remittance Director 
Bank Central Asia 
Jakarta Indonesia.
